name: Cracker
description:
Please, I am fully aware of all the missing content and I am trying to get it all in. This is just a prototype for testing an idea i had. I want feedback on improvements that is not on this list:

-Working directory system

-More story

This game is not even near a 1/15 of completion.

/Hexagon

The world... what is the world... do you know?

To be added:

-More story

-A working directory system

Please suggest ideas in the comment section

What is new in 0.9:

-The beginning of a story (Don't pay attention to the "Follow the message to begin your trial" as it is not yet implemented into the game)

-One new server

-Bug fixes
